title: Taking Courageous Steps to Save Your Marriage, Part 6
itunes:author: John Fuller & Greg Smalley
itunes:summary: Dealing with your own problems can build a healthier marriage. John and Greg explain how allowing God to change your heart is the key to a better relationship.
description: Dealing with your own problems can build a healthier marriage. John and Greg explain how allowing God to change your heart is the key to a better relationship.
content:encoded: Dealing with your own problems can build a healthier marriage. John and Greg explain how allowing God to change your heart is the key to a better relationship.
